summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3351, for the improvement of Westlake Avenue, from Denny Way to 7th Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41371 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
